content.label: Any game from Pixelocity Software is going to be good. Still playing DiscDrivin after many years.
Two years since new tracks have been added. It was fun long ago but now it is stale.
The adds have recently taken over this once fun game.  Ads are to long and to often.  Deleted the game and not worth paying for.  Done.
This was my FIRST iPhone game I got, 2013, and I've loved it! I'm still playing with one player since then too!
I first downloaded this game on my iPod touch and this is the only game to of withstood the test of time. My friends and I always play a little pass and play, great game good fun.
Game physics could be a smidge better, more tracks/create a track and more FREE customizing discs.

Disc Driving is a very smooth app to run and play solo or with friends. The game physics flow neatly for both straight forward and complex turns. 
   The in game options are streamline yet allow for customization. 
    Many tracks and game modes allow for various ways to play both online and off, making no two matches alike. I have experienced no bugs or glitches in either mode.
     The light version of this game contains adds every few turns, but they are related and are easy to cancel out of. 
      Disc Driving helps me engage my far away friends and meet new people with the online paring, and even offers a chat function that is smooth, and have not encountered any undesired conversations. 
The community around this app is friendly and I have received encouragement and tips from other players via the messing. I highly recommend Disk Driving to any player or fan of disc golf, and anyone looking for a game that can be as causal or competitive as you would like to make it.
Way way way way too many ads. Constantly opens the AppStore. I gave up before even finishing a race or deciding whether I like the game well enough to get the paid version.
Very fun to play
If you love apps that constantly crash, have extended ads you can't pass through and constantly redirects you to the App Store, this game is for you.
been playing almost 5 years now, would be great if they updated the problems more.... but hell I'm guessing they are fine collecting the ad money after so long.

I've been playing this app for years and it's constantly getting worse. It crashes a lot, the ads are plenty and sometimes won't load so you can continue playing, now it's consistently opening the App Store during play and ruining the move you make on your turn. There's never any updates or maintenance updates. It's getting boring and worn out and with the ads screwing up your game moves, what's the point? I'm about to be removing it I believe.

The free version stalls and crashes regularly before/after a move for my family and friends, but don't let that keep you from buying the full 3-dollar version, which works like a charm! Think of this as a demo, rather than a free version, to try out the game before deciding to buy.

The company was very responsive by email in trying to sort out the stalls and crashes, which it couldn't reproduce, and I suspect they are related to the free version's ad-specific programming.

Everyone i introduce to this app loves it!! Its so fun and an incredible pass time when there is nothing going on. However, i wish that the app would refresh itself when sending turns to other players online. Someone may send you their turn but you wont see it until you exit the app and re-enter it. Also, someone already mentioned: the app should auto-replay your opponent's most recent turn when you open your race.  PLEASE UPDATE!!
The app is fun but it crashes every time I open it. I have to open it several times before it will work right. Quite frustrating!
I love the game and have been playing it since it first released, but it would be nice for it to get updated regularly because the app crashes... A LOT.
best game ever

Love playing this game to pass the time but the app execution is terrible. I have to force close the app between EVERY play because the ads don't launch properly. Been playing since 2012 and it's been an issue since I installed.
Simply Awesome!

title.label: Fun till my hands fall asleep!

content.label: Have been playing for over a year. Love this game, even by myself. Just set to pass and play, select eight players and turn on the bombs. Usually never guess which one will win. Playing with others is even more fun.

title.label: Fun game, but too much spam; some spam bugged

content.label:
Game is a LOT of fun. 
However u get spammed with ads in between most moves. Sometimes u have NO WAY to close the ad!!! You have to shut down and restart game!

Very annoying to play for those reasons.

Fun game! But when playing a WiFi game, an ad will take you to the app store in the middle of the game with no way to return to the game. Ads also pop up in the middle of your turn. It's frustrating that you can't even finish the game. I enjoy playing, but that glitch is terrible.

Honesty my go to game at any time. I play the pass and play mode vs myself, love it. It's amazing. Would be even better if you could choose your colors for the players in pass and play mode, also if the multiplayer mode was smoother, more levels obviously but really overall amazing game
Love this game. Have played it all the time with my friends for years. If you could add a refresh button it would make the game that much better, thanks!

This game is great 10/9 would play again.

Love you

Have a great day
Excellent game!  Very fun.  Good online community.  One of the best iOS games.
A simple game that's a lot of fun. Has been on my phone for years and I still enjoy it very much.
Great game. The whole family plays. It keeps us "together" even when we are in different cities.
This game isn't complicated, but playing it against friends is pure joy. I love it and always come back to it.

This game is awesome. My friends and i have been playing it for two and a half years and haven't grown tired of it. I've never written a review on the AppStore, except for this game. They even came out with three new courses this past month which was awesome. I just wish i could contact the developers somehow so i could tell them how sweet it is and to make more of it (more courses, different scenery, stuff like that). But even if it never gets updated again, my friends and i will still enjoy this fun game.
I love this game!!😀
This game is so fun to play
Don't bother. It's like bad shuffleboard. But around a track. "Race" takes forever. And there's an ad after every 3rd turn?! So bad. Not fun at all.
Easily takes your mind off of things.
Fun for the whole family!!!
Great game for killing time.

Great game very fun to play with friends and family members  but i have one complaint. When you start playing with a random person online and the person decides bot to move u get stuck in the game until they move then u can resign. U can still play another game while in the one ur on but its just annoying...
Need new boards. Also need new disc designs. Please!
A true challenge that takes some time to master. Addictive!!!
Need more power ups
It's great, but really needs a refresh button to keep games updated.
great game
Wow, it sends the turn so slowly on in iPhone 5 with ATT in the middle of Los Angeles. I have to exit the game now and again to refresh and make the turn send. Much slow, no fun.  Wow.

I really love this game! I always play it with my friends and it's a hilariously good time. The only thing I wish they would add to the game is way to make your own maps! If they add this it would be the best game in the App Store!
Simple and fun. I like that I can play with friends in different cities.

title.label: Way to many gliches and adds

content.label: Way to many gliches and adds but the game is fun
Awesome game. Simple enough to play, but enough options/features to keep it exciting. I also like that you can pretty much play as much and at whatever pace you want.
Get your friends to DL. Competitive, fun turn by turn.
